pli-tv-bu-vb-sk74:0.5.eng: 74. The training rule on defecating on cultivated plants

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk74:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk74:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk74:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū harite uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karonti …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk74:1.2.eng: At that time the monks from the group of six were defecating, urinating, and spitting on cultivated plants. …

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk74:1.3.1.pli: “Na harite agilāno uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk74:1.3.1.eng: “‘When not sick, I will not defecate, urinate, or spit on cultivated plants,’ this is how you should train.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk74:1.3.1.comm: Harite could in principle refer to all plants, but it is elsewhere defined as what is cultivated, see Bu Pc 19:2.1.14 and Bi Pc 9:2.1.14.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk74:1.4.pli: Na harite agilānena uccāro vā passāvo vā kheḷo vā kātabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk74:1.4.eng: If one is not sick, one should not defecate, urinate, or spit on cultivated plants.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk74:1.5.pli: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca harite agilāno uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karoti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk74:1.5.eng: If, out of disrespect, a monk who is not sick defecates, urinates, or spits on cultivated plants, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk74:1.11.eng: if he does it in a place with no cultivated plants, but it then spreads to cultivated plants;

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk74:1.14.eng: if he is the first offender.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk74:1.15.eng: The fourteenth training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:0.5.eng: 75. The training rule on defecating in water

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karonti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.2.eng: At that time the monks from the group of six were defecating, urinating, and spitting in water.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.4.pli: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karissanti, seyyathāpi gihī kāmabhogino”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.4.eng: “How can the Sakyan monastics defecate, urinate, and spit in water? They’re just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.5.pli: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.5.eng: The monks heard the complaints of those people,

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.6.pli: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.6.eng: and the monks of few desires complained and criticized those monks,

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.7.pli: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.7.eng: “How can the monks from the group of six do this?” …

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.8.pli: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karothā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.8.eng: “Is it true, monks, that you do this?”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.11.pli: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.11.eng: “Foolish men, how can you do this?

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.13.pli: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.13.eng: “And, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.14.1.pli: “Na udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.14.1.eng: ‘“I will not defecate, urinate, or spit in water,” this is how you should train.’”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.15.pli: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.15.eng: In this way the Buddha laid down this training rule for the monks.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.1.pli: Tena kho pana samayena gilānā bhikkhū udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi kātuṃ kukkuccāyanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.1.eng: Soon afterwards, being afraid of wrongdoing, sick monks did not defecate, urinate, or spit in water.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.3.pli: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.3.eng: Soon afterwards he gave a teaching and addressed the monks:

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.4.pli: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānena bhikkhunā udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi kātuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.4.eng: “Monks, I allow a sick monk to defecate, urinate, or spit in water.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.5.pli: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.5.eng: And so, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.6.1.pli: “Na udake agilāno uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.6.1.eng: ‘“When not sick, I will not defecate, urinate, or spit in water,” this is how you should train.’”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.7.pli: Na udake agilānena uccāro vā passāvo vā kheḷo vā kātabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.7.eng: If one is not sick, one should not defecate, urinate, or spit in water.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.8.pli: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake agilāno uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karoti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.8.eng: If, out of disrespect, a monk who is not sick defecates, urinates, or spits in water, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.14.eng: if he does it on dry ground, but it then spreads to water;

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.18.eng: if he is overwhelmed by pain;

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.19.eng: if he is the first offender.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.20.eng: The fifteenth training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.21.eng: The seventh subchapter on shoes is finished.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.22.eng: “Venerables, the rules to be trained in have been recited.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.23.eng: In regard to this I ask you,

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.29.eng: You are pure in this and therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.30.eng: The rules to be trained in are finished.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.31.eng: The chapter on training is finished.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk8:0.4.eng: The subchapter on evenly all around

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk8:0.5.eng: 8. The second training rule on lowered eyes

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk8:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk8:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk8:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū tahaṃ tahaṃ olokentā antaraghare nisīdanti …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk8:1.2.eng: At that time the monks from the group of six were looking here and there while sitting in inhabited areas. …

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk8:1.3.1.eng: “‘I will lower my eyes while sitting in inhabited areas,’ this is how you should train.”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk8:1.4.eng: One should lower one’s eyes while sitting in an inhabited area, looking a plow’s length ahead.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk8:1.5.pli: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca tahaṃ tahaṃ olokento antaraghare nisīdati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk8:1.5.eng: If a monk, out of disrespect, looks here and there while sitting in an inhabited area, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk8:1.13.eng: if he is the first offender.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk8:1.14.eng: The eighth training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk9:0.4.eng: The subchapter on evenly all around

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk9:0.5.eng: 9. The training rule on lifted robes

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk9:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk9:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk9:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū ukkhittakāya antaraghare gacchanti …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk9:1.2.eng: At that time the monks from the group of six were lifting their robes while walking in inhabited areas. …

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk9:1.3.1.eng: “‘I will not lift my robe while walking in inhabited areas,’ this is how you should train.”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk9:1.4.eng: One should not lift one’s robe while walking in an inhabited area.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk9:1.5.pli: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca ekato vā ubhato vā ukkhipitvā antaraghare gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk9:1.5.eng: If a monk, out of disrespect, lifts his robe on one or both sides while walking in an inhabited area, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk9:1.13.eng: if he is the first offender.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk9:1.14.eng: The ninth training rule is finished.
